Package comets

Class Summary
Comet This class is the root of all comet objects.
LargeComet Objects of this class represent large comets.
MediumComet Objects of this class represent medium-sized comets.
Ship Objects of this class represent player controlled spaceships.
Shot Objects of this class represent the bullets fired by the player's ship.
SmallComet Objects of this class represent small comets.
SpaceObject This class is the root of the hierarchy of objects that float in space.
